entities.name: thetwomen
entities.description: A group of people appeared out of nowhere in the narrow, moonlit lane.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape replied to a question with 'The best'.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley mentioned that he might be late and hoped someone would be satisfied.

relationships.description: Severus Snape and the group of people stood with wands directed at each other's chests.
Yaxley spoke to Severus Snape, asking if he was late and hoping someone would be satisfied.
The group of people recognized Yaxley when they met.
Severus Snape replied to a question from Yaxley.
